title: Infosys Strategic Partnership for Enterprise AI Engineering
description: Cognition announced a strategic partnership with Infosys to deploy Devin across Infosys's internal engineering ecosystem and global client engagements. The collaboration leverages Infosys Topaz Fabric to scale AI software engineering capabilities across enterprises. The partnership marks a significant enterprise adoption milestone for autonomous AI software engineering and has sparked discussions about the future of junior developer roles.

title: Claude Code 2.1 Released with Major Agentic Workflow Improvements
description: Anthropic released Claude Code 2.1.0 with 1,096 commits worth of improvements including Skill Hot-Reloading for updating workflows without restarting, Session Teleportation, new `/release-notes` command, image source metadata understanding, clickable hyperlinks for file paths, and Winget install support. The release features a complete skills system overhaul, enhanced agent lifecycle control, improved session portability, and multilingual output capabilities.

title: CLI v0.0.374 Released with Enhanced Agent Features
description: GitHub Copilot CLI released version 0.0.374 on January 2, 2026, featuring auto-compaction at 95% token limit with new `/compact` command, built-in subagents for exploring and managing tasks, and a built-in `web_fetch` tool for fetching web content. The release also includes improved MCP server type help text, clearer model picker messages when models are unavailable, and enhanced error handling for model selection.

title: Gemini 3 Flash Model Now Available
description: Windsurf added Gemini 3 Flash model availability for all users, combining Gemini 3 Pro-grade reasoning with Flash-level speed and efficiency. The model delivers 3x faster performance than previous generations and superior coding intelligence, outperforming Pro-tier models on key coding benchmarks with 78% on SWE-bench Verified. It features deep multimodal understanding for complex video, data extraction, and visual Q&A tasks.

title: Holiday 2025 Release: Layout Customization and Stability Focus
description: Cursor released a major update focusing on layout customization with four default layouts (agent, editor, zen, browser) accessible via Cmd+Option+Tab, and significant stability improvements across the core agent, layout controls, and code diff viewing. The update also introduced Linux sandboxing for agents, service accounts for Enterprise teams, and Debug Mode for reproducing and fixing tricky bugs with runtime logs across stacks and languages.
